Class Message

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.models.Message
public class Message extends Object
Represents a single message in a chat. A message is sent by one user to another as part of a chat conversation.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(int idUserSender, int idChat, String content, LocalDateTime timestamp)
      Constructs a new Message instance.
      Parameters:
      idUserSender - The ID of the user who sent the message.
      idChat - The ID of the chat the message belongs to.
      content - The text content of the message.
      timestamp - The timestamp indicating when the message was sent.

    • Message

      Constructs a new Message instance.
      Parameters:
      idMessage - The unique ID of the message.
      idUserSender - The ID of the user who sent the message.
      idChat - The ID of the chat the message belongs to.
      content - The text content of the message.
      timestamp - The timestamp indicating when the message was sent.
